meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cade Varnado Chrissy Bellizzi Jonathan Dinerstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7899.

td.p: Cade Varnado, an English instructor from Richmond, Virginia
Chrissy Bellizzi, a librarian from St. Louis, Missouri
Jonathan Dinerstein, a composer from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,501)

tr.td: HOW TO PLAY QUIDDITCH
AMERICAN HISTORY
CROSSWORD CLUES "D"
GETTING SQUIRRELLY
MONDAY NIGHT NON-FOOTBALL TV
WHAT'S THAT SMELL?

Certain ground squirrels fend off rattlesnakes by shaking their tails & creating heat, & since the snakes detect the heat via this type of light, they go defensive & leave their prey be')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows a squirrel and a rattlesnake on the monitor.) Certain ground squirrels fend off rattlesnakes by shaking their tails & creating heat, & since the snakes detect the heat via this type of light, they go defensive & leave their prey be
